Manchas de 칩leo chegam a Abrolhos

02 Nov 2019, 12:33

As manchas de 칩leo atingiram neste s치bado o Parque Nacional de Abrolhos, no sul da Bahia.
Segundo ao grupo que acompanha o vazamento, formado pela Marinha, ANP e Ibama, foram registrados pequenos fragmentos na praia norte da Ilha de Santa B치rbara.
text:
Oil stains reach Abrolhos

02 Nov 2019, 12:33

Oil slicks hit the Abrolhos National Park on southern Bahia on Saturday.
According to the group that follows the spill, formed by the Navy, ANP and Ibama, small fragments were recorded on the north beach of Santa Barbara Island.
